## page 12

```{python, echo=TRUE}
import numpy as np
P=np.array([[0.7, 0.3],[0.5, 0.5]])
print(P)
```

```{python, echo=TRUE}
egien_value, egien_vector = np.linalg.eig(P.T) # eigen-decomposition for P^t 
print(egien_value)
print(egien_vector)
```


```{python, echo=TRUE}
x_1=egien_vector[:,0]
print(x_1)
```

```{python, echo,TRUE}
v=x_1/np.sum(x_1)
print(v)
```

## page 15

```{python, echo=TRUE}
import numpy as np
P=np.array([[0.7, 0.3],[0.5, 0.5]])
n=len(P) # n=|S|
I=np.identity(n) # identity matrix 
A=np.c_[P-I,np.repeat(1,n)]
b=np.append(np.repeat(0,n), np.array(1))
print(A)
```


```{python, echo=TRUE}
print(b)
```


```{python, echo=TRUE}
v=np.linalg.solve(np.dot(A,A.T),np.dot(A,b.T))
print(v)
```



## page 17

```{python,echo=TRUE}
from numpy.linalg import matrix_power # provides matrix pwoer
P=np.array([[0.7, 0.3],[0.5, 0.5]])
print(P)
```


```{python,echo=TRUE}
print(np.dot(P,P)) # matrix multiplication
```


```{python,echo=TRUE}
print(matrix_power(P,3))
```


```{python,echo=TRUE}
print(matrix_power(P,4))
```


```{python,echo=TRUE}
print(matrix_power(P,20))
```
